member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.AccountsController.GetAccounts(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of accounts based off user specifications
member.param: Only results that contain this name will be reported
Determines if the sort order will be Ascending or Descending
Sets the page that will be retrieved
Sets the number of entries which will appear on a given page (Max of 20)
member.returns: A list of accounts based off the entered parameters. If no parameters are entered, all entries are returned

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.AccountsController.PostAccount(Application.DTOs.Requests.CreationRequest)
member.summary: Creates a new Account with the provided name given the name follows the required naming convention
member.param: A record which contains a string name for the new account
member.returns: The information of the generated account

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.AccountsController.GetAccount(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an account based off a given ID
member.param: The unique identification for the requested account
member.returns: The account information corresponding to the ID

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.AccountsController.PostDeposit(System.String,Application.DTOs.Requests.ChangeBalanceRequest)
member.summary: Adds an entered money amount to a requested account
member.param: The unique identification for the requested account
A record which contains a decimal amount that will be deposited

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.AccountsController.PostWithdraw(System.String,Application.DTOs.Requests.ChangeBalanceRequest)
member.summary: Subtracts an entered money amount to a requested account
member.param: The unique identification for the requested account
A record which contains a decimal amount that will be withdrawn

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.AccountsController.PostTransfer(Application.DTOs.Requests.TransferRequest)
member.summary: Takes money from one account and moves it to another
member.param: A record that contains an id for the sending account, an id for the receiving account, along with the decimal amount that will be transferred

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.AccountsController.GetConversion(System.String,Application.DTOs.Requests.ConversionRequest)
member.summary: Returns the balance of a provided account converted into the requested currencies
member.param: The unique identification for the requested account
A record which contains a string holding comma separated currencies
member.returns: A record containing a dictionary where the keys are the currency type and the values are the balance converted to the respective value

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.AuthenticationController.GetAuthenticationToken
member.returns: A JWT allowing access to Accounts controller

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.CreateDocumentationId(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates a documentation comment ID for a type. Example: T:Namespace.Outer+Inner`1 becomes T:Namespace.Outer.Inner`1

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.CreateDocumentationId(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Generates a documentation comment ID for a property. Example: P:Namespace.ContainingType.PropertyName or for an indexer P:Namespace.ContainingType.Item(System.Int32)

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.CreateDocumentationId(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a documentation comment ID for a property given its container type and property name. Example: P:Namespace.ContainingType.PropertyName

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.CreateDocumentationId(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Generates a documentation comment ID for a method (or constructor). For example: M:Namespace.ContainingType.MethodName(ParamType1,ParamType2)~ReturnType M:Namespace.ContainingType.#ctor(ParamType)

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.GetTypeDocId(System.Type,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a documentation ID string for a type. This method handles nested types (replacing '+' with '.'), generic types, arrays, pointers, by-ref types, and generic parameters. The flag controls whether constructed generic type arguments are emitted, while controls whether the generic arity marker (e.g. "`1") is appended.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.Generated.DocumentationCommentIdHelper.NormalizeDocId(System.String)
member.summary: Normalizes a documentation comment ID to match the compiler-style format. Strips the return type suffix for ordinary methods but retains it for conversion operators.
member.param: The documentation comment ID to normalize.
